title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
review: An excellent book that focuses on practical software development principles.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
review: Great guide to writing clean, readable, and maintainable code.

title: You Don't Know JS
author: Kyle Simpson
review: A deep dive into JavaScript that explains the tricky parts of the language.

title: Eloquent JavaScript
author: Marijn Haverbeke
review: A great introduction to JavaScript, with helpful exercises.

title: Refactoring
author: Martin Fowler
review: Good concepts but requires some programming background to fully understand.
